content: **the fäboda cardigan** is a crochet pattern designed for intermediate-level crocheters with some experience in garment construction the construction is based on simple rectangular panels making it a great introduction to crocheting clothing without complex shaping this pattern is written for a fitted size xs you can adjust the fit by changing the yarn weight and hook size the sample measurements are shoulder-to-shoulder 40 cm total length 50 cm and sleeve length 60 cm **gauge ** 20 half double crochets and 18 row = 10 x 10 cm using a 4 mm hook **yarn ** the pattern uses dk weight yarn the sample is made with novita kajastus approx 280 m / 100 g in the colorway merenranta 872 other suitable options include among others novita nalle and tukuwool dk for size xs the yarn requirement is approximately 500 grams **you will need ** a 4 mm crochet hook stitch markers safety pins or blocking pins buttons a yarn needle and scissors **techniques include ** chain stitches single crochets half double crochets double crochets front and back post stitches decreases and filet crochet for lace details to customize the cardigan you can use cotton yarn or replace half double crochets with double crochets for a more breathable result you can also modify the length by adding or reducing row
